title: Brussels ‘power shift’ driven by speed, influence brokers need new game plan [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Centralisation of decision-making, fragmentation in the Parliament, and less external tolerance for delay are all causing a shift in power dynamics, where speed is key to influence
summary_public: Centralisation of decision-making, fragmentation in the Parliament, and less external tolerance for delay are all causing a shift in power dynamics, where speed is key to influence
